attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: If I could give this app a negative rating, I would without hesitation! Only complete morons would download this and actually like it. ✨is anyone else here from tik tok✨ anyways... this app is awful and your funny if you think I WOULD EVER vote for trump. The man is a horrible person, just saying.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: when i got this app i was so ecstatic to finally be up to date with our amazing, show stopping, magnificent president ✨ but instead when i tried to open the app it would glitch out and wouldn’t let me go in the app 😡 i am so mad and disappointed that someone could make such a terrible app that won’t even let me open the app😡 because of this i have missed so much information about the rally!!! i hope no one gets this app because it is honestly a sad excuse for an app!!!

attributes.title: Donald’s pig in a blanket ✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: Today at the grocery store I witnessed something horrible. My mother was being a racist and some teenager came over and beat the living Holy Ghost outta her. She was rushed to the ER and learned to never be a racist again. Sadly the girl who beat her up is on the loose bu I just wanna thank her for Showing my mom a lesson, luv you girly <3

attributes.title: Disgustingly awful
attributes.review: This app is a waste of your time and crashes every two seconds it is not worth it. Do. It get this it is useful awful and has no point. It’s terrifying at how bad it is. Awful quality. I wish I could go less than a one star

attributes.title: creepy🤢
attributes.review: this whole app gave off a really creepy vibe. it said some really upsetting things about women, the LGBTQ+ community, and people of other races. also he has a really bad spray tan and toupee, which is a thing all in itself. overall, this app has to be stopped as soon as possible.

attributes.title: Incredibly horrible
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app and support my wonderful, handsome, immaculate president ❤️Donald Jenius Trump❤️ but when I was texting him he told me that I am a disgrace to aMeRiCa and after that I couldn’t open the app again. An app like this shouldn’t be on the App Store . Have a horrible day:)

attributes.title: this app is FALSE ADVERTISING
attributes.review: i downloaded it because i am interested in learning how to play the trumpet. i open the app and it doesn’t look like trumpets, but i enter my email, phone number, credit card, etc. turns out, this is an app for a PRESIDENT  not a TRUMPET. i am very disappointed. do not download this app 😡😡

attributes.title: HORRIBLE I DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: horrible, as soon as i open the app i smell a horrible stench coming from outside my door, as i open my door is trump smelling like old tampons and dirty gamer girl water, i try to run out my window but as soon as i open it he stops me and tells me, make america white again, trump is love trump is life

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: It was stinky. I don’t know how an app can be stinky but I just got this horrendous feeling inside me and it just smelled bad??? I might have to go to the hospital cause this is causing some major smelling problems and it’s lasted for 3 hours now so...don’t get this app cause it causes major smelling issues

attributes.title: terrible make me shart
attributes.review: i opened this app multiple times in hope to see how terrible it was but every time it seemed to have made my house start shaking and I couldn’t stop sharting i am very traumatized and have heard that this has happened to a few others❤️😹😹😜😜
